title.en: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo, Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトは異世界で勇者になったけど、俺だけ現代日本に置き去りにされました

altTitles.en: My Classmates Became Heroes in Another World, But I was Left Behind in Modern Japan

description.en:
"Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!"

Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted.

While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—!?
description.ja:
「おめでとう！　君たち25人は世界を救う勇者に選ばれました！」

中学3年の夏休み前、突然現れた女神・アシェラによって行われたクラス単位の異世界転移。
26人の生徒は異世界で勇者になれるよう、スキルやチート能力を使うことができるステータスを与えられ転移させられる。しかしその人数は25人――転校したばかりでカウントされていなかった少年・伊織修は現代日本に置き去りにされた。

異世界で鍛練し、来る勇者としての戦いに備えるクラスメイトとは違い、平和な日本で修は与えられたステータスの研究に没頭する。密かにスキルの性能の試行錯誤をしつつ、その力で時折身の回りの人助けをしていた修だが、いつの間にか世界の組織から狙われるような存在になっていて――？

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

altTitles.ja: JESUS 砂塵航路

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

altTitles.en: More Peace than a Harem: In Another World, Let Me Be a Neet Princess in Peace
I Wish for Peace Instead of a Harem! Let Me Be a NEET Princess Peacefully in Another World

altTitles.es-la: Más paz que un harem - En otro mundo, déjame ser una princesa Nini en paz
En otro mundo, déjame ser una princesa NiNi en paz

description.en:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)
description.ja:
エリートサラリーマン、姫様にTS転生してオナ●ート生活…!!!?

ニートを夢見てFIREをした、エリートサラリーマン・岸辺。夢の生活も目前!! のはずが、車にひかれる寸前だった女の子を助けたことで死亡してしまう。そんな彼を憐れんだ自称神様が岸辺をニートができる異世界へと転生。気づけば超大国の姫様・アイリスになっていた!!! 超絶美少女で一切働く必要がなく、惰眠と自由とオナ●ーのし放題で岸辺は人生勝ち組!! …と確信していたが、ある問題が。この姫様、最高レベルの愛され体質（スキル？）みたいで、色々な女の子が姫様（元男）に迫られまくり……!!?

異世界で愛されまくって働かないメシが上手いか？を体験できる、羨ましすぎる異世界TSクソニートハーレム!!!!

altTitles.ja: ファイアパンチ

description.en:
In the not-too-distant past, the Ice Witch blanketed the world in snow, starvation and madness, leading the inhabitants to seek their salvation in fire. With that, an unusual destiny unfolds for two young orphans, Agni and Luna, blessed with the ability to regenerate. But will this ability prove to be more of a curse than a blessing?

Nominee for the 2017 Manga Taisho Award.
description.ru: Людей рождающихся с даром называют одарёнными. Для кого-то это благословение, для некоторых проклятье. Проклятьем для всех остальных сделала свой дар Ведьма Льда. Повелевая холодом она забрала у мира всё и оставила лишь голод, снег и безумие.
description.uk: У недалекому минулому Льодяна відьма вкрила світ снігом, голодом і божевіллям, змушуючи людей шукати притулок у вогні. Незвичайна доля складається для двох маленьких сиріт Аґні та Луни, які були наділені здібністю до відродження. Але прокляттям, чи благословенням стане ця здібність?

Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

description.en: Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.
description.ja: 度が過ぎるほど“マジメ”な風紀委員・桜大門くんの日々の役目は、校門当番として生徒たちの服装をチェックすること。彼がいつも注意するのは、髪の毛が明るくミニスカートな“問題児”小日向さん。口うるさい桜大門くんを嫌がる彼女だったが、彼が実はかなりの“ポンコツ”であることを知ってしまい…！？
description.pt-br: Sakuradaimon é o monitor do colégio; um monitor é um aluno que é pode aplicar atos disciplinatórios. Como monitor ele deve ser um aluno modelo para os outros estudantes, mas infelizmente ele não é perfeito. Kohinata é uma das estudantes que o Sakuradaimon tenta disciplinar devido ao uso incorreto do uniforme escolar, mas até o presente momento ela foi desobediente. Esta é a história entre a interação entre os dois.

altTitles.ja: きゃたぴランド

description.en: Violence!!!! Shootouts!!!! Zombies!!!! Electricity!!!! An office life comedy with no straight man begins.

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.ja: 王様のプロポーズ

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

altTitles.ja: 苺ましまろ

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

altTitles.ja: ド級編隊エグゼロス

description.en:
In a world on the verge of a great disaster, heroes who, with the help of a device called HxEros, use the power of Ecchi (H) and erotic power (Ero) to save the planet from libido-devouring monsters!  
  
Five years ago, an unknown type of alien called "Censor Bugs" invaded the Earth. They plunder "H energy" in an attempt to evolve their own race and make mankind extinct. To save the Earth from this alien threat, high school boy Retto Enjo joins the "HxEros" team, partnering with four gorgeous high school girls; one of whom is his childhood friend Kirara Hoshino. However, it turns out that Kirara has changed her personality a lot which leads to an estrangement between the two childhood friends.
description.pt: Em um mundo que está a beira de um grande desastre que começou 5 anos atrás, o mundo apenas pode ser salvo por Heróis que com a ajuda de um aparelho chamado HxEros, usam o poder do Ecchi(H) e o poder erótico(Ero) para salvar o mundo de perder o tesão!
description.pt-br: Em um mundo que está a beira de um grande desastre que começou 5 anos atrás, o mundo apenas pode ser salvo por Heróis que com a ajuda de um aparelho chamado HxEros, usam o poder do Ecchi(H) e o poder erótico(Ero) para salvar o mundo de perder o tesão!

altTitles.ja: ラストマン

description.en:
A mysterious boy lies naked and unconscious on the street. The story begins when ninth grader, Ai Oomori, and his third grader brother, Seigi, find him. This boy has no memory of the past and doesn't even know his real name. He is like a little baby. Ai names this boy Makoto and takes him back home. Makoto has superhuman physical powers and can even recover quickly from injuries. Who is Makoto? Makoto is easygoing and not at all bothered by everyone's curiosity. Until that is he is pursued by a cruel woman who disguises herself as a spider. A neo sapiens, this spider woman has been dispatched by a mystery organization called, "Love & Peace." Her mission is to bring back Makoto dead or alive.  
  
Source: MU

description.en:
Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel.

The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement...

[Impregnation confirmed.]
[Level up!]

"Does this mean that the more 'seeding' I do, the stronger I get?"

An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!
description.id: Petualang "Zarmen" yang tidak bisa marah memutuskan untuk pensiun dari bisnis petualangan.  Selain itu, karena belum lulus dari keperawanan, dia memutuskan untuk membelanjakan semua kekayaan yang telah dia kumpulkan sejak dia bereinkarnasi di rumah bordil mewah.  Apa yang muncul di depannya adalah seorang wanita luar biasa yang tampaknya tidak memiliki hubungan selama sisa hidupnya.  Berkat keramahannya, Zarmen sepenuhnya menikmati seks pertamanya, tetapi pada saat dia berada dipuncaknya, sebuah pengumuman misterius muncul "Level up!" Terdengar di telinganya!  Ini adalah sebuah fantasi petualangan yang aneh dimana petualang terbawah level 1 selama bertahun-tahun tumbuh melalui segs.
description.ja:
うだつの上がらない冒険者“ザルメン”は、冒険業からの引退を決意。さらに童貞も卒業するため、転生してから今までせっせと貯めてきた全財産を高級娼館でひと思いに散財することにした。
そんな彼の前に現れたのは、彼には一生縁のなさそうな極上の女。彼女のもてなしもあり、ザルメンは初めてのセックスを十分に堪能するが、イッた瞬間、彼の耳には「着床を確認しました。レベルアップ！」という謎のアナウンスが！
「これってもしかして、“種付け”するほど強くなるってこと…？」
万年レベル1だった底辺冒険者がセックスを通して成り上がる、奇想天外な着床系異世界冒険ファンタジー！

description.en: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

description.en:
A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here!

The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.
description.id: Seorang pria yang telah bereinkarnasi di dunia lain memperoleh panggilan "master tongkat" di dunia baru!  Namun, kemampuan itu tidak digunakan untuk mengalahkan musuh, atau untuk mendapatkan kekuatan, melainkan untuk ngentot dengan gadis-gadis cantik yang terus muncul!
description.ja: ノクターンノベルズ大人気作！ 異世界転生したとある男は新天地で「竿師」なる天職を手にする！ だが、その異能は敵を倒すためでもなく、権力を手にするためでもなく、ただひたすらに全力で次々と現れる美少女を抱くことに使うのだ！ 異色の異世界制覇譚、ここに開幕！

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: A temptation from which you can't escape…

altTitles.ja: Aの劇場

description.en:
1: Oeufs D'ange (Tenshi no Tamago)  
A man is asked by a young painter to be her model.  
  
2: Velvet Going Underground  
A doll becomes a super idol. Hijinks ensue.  
  
3: Childhood's End  
Alastair runs away and meets the Rabbit.  
  
4: Bite Me Something  
Allistaire followed Mr. Rabbit all the way to Wonderland. Will he be able to find him among the crowd?  
  
5: Long Along Alonging  
A girl asks a vampire to be his apprentice. But what is her motive?  
  
6: Till Dawn  
In a dark tower, a caged voice is singing until a hunted man enters the darkness.  
  
7: Leçon Un  
Sequel to Long Along Alonging.  
  
8: My Skin On My Back  
  
9: Highland Walker  
Sequel to Leçon un.  
  
10: Perfect World  
The story of a young wife whose husband is infected with a fatal disease called Flower-Blossomitis.  
  
11: Perfect Lady  
Sequel to Perfect World and drawn especially for this book.  
  
12-13: Looks Like A Teaspoon  
A boy named Allistaire is often teased at his all-boys school. One night he dresses like a girl and stumbles upon the boy who often bullies him, Simon. Allistaire runs off into a tower and as Simon runs after him, we see the sign "Welcome to Wonderland" hanging by the tower's door.  
  
14: The Pearl Blue Story  
Do you believe in mermaids? Coggy, a young boy finds a mysterious lady laying down near the shore of the beach. He brings her home to help her.  
  
15: I Am A Piano  
A piano tells the story of her life and the people she encounters.  
  
16: Parade
description.it:
2: Velvet Going Underground  
Una storia alternativa della nota fiaba di Pinocchio. Pinocchio in questo caso è una donna e diventa una super idol.

altTitles.ja: R15＋じゃダメですか？

description.en: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she’s a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it’s not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie…?
description.ja:
大人になるって、どうすればいいの？　親からすべての娯楽を禁止されて育った天羽秋音は、ドラマのキスシーンも観れないくらい、”刺激的”なものが少し苦手。高校生にもなったんだから、なんとか克服したい！　と意気込むが、なかなか道は険しい。そんな中、映画オタクの冬峰と知り合い、15禁映画を観ることになり…⁉
 
--- 
 
Otona ni naru tte, dōsureba ī no? Oya kara subete no goraku o kinshi sa rete sodatta Amou aki-on wa, dorama no kisushīn mo mi renai kurai, ”shigeki-teki” na mono ga sukoshi nigate. Kōkōsei ni mo natta ndakara, nantoka kokufuku shitai! To ikigomu ga, nakanaka michi wa kewashī. Son'na Chū, eiga otaku no fuyu-hō to shiriai, 15 kin eiga o miru koto ni nari...!?
description.vi:
"Mình sẽ làm gì để trở thành người lớn?"
Akane Amo, lớn lên trong sự bảo bọc nghiêm khắc của cha mẹ mà không tiếp xúc với phương tiện giải trí, bước qua tuổi 15, trước những thứ "tình cảm", thậm chí là một nụ hôn cũng không thể xem được.
Giờ đã vào trường cấp ba, cùng với cậu bạn Fuyumine, Amo sẽ bước qua những rào cản ấy. Liệu cô bé có thể xem được một phim nhán mác "cấm trẻ em"?
description.pt-br:
O que devo fazer para me tornar uma adulta?

Akane Amou, que cresceu com seus pais proibindo qualquer tipo de entretenimento, é um pouco ruim com coisas "estimulantes", até o ponto de não conseguir assistir a uma cena de beijo em um drama. Agora que ela é estudante do ensino médio, ela quer de alguma forma superá-lo! Essas são suas intenções, mas não é tão fácil. Enquanto isso, ela se familiarizou com um filme otaku chamado Fuyumine. Será que ela será capaz de assistir um filme R15...?

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es:
*"Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".*

De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.
description.fr: Oscar, prince héritier du grand royaume de Farsas, se rend chez Tinasha, la sorcière la plus puissante du continent, pour lever une malédiction dont il est victime depuis sa jeunesse, qui l’empêche d’avoir des enfants. Lorsqu’il passe l’épreuve de la “Tour de la sorcière”, qui lui donne le droit à n’importe quel souhait, il demande alors la main de Tinasha !
description.ja:
呪われた王と最強の魔女が紡ぐ、【愛】と【呪い】の一大叙事詩が開幕！

このライトノベルがすごい！2020（宝島社刊）にて単行本部門とノベルズ部門でダブル１位となった伝説的ＷＥＢノベルが待望のコミック化！

永い時を生き、絶大な力で災厄を呼ぶ異端――魔女。
強国ファルサスの王太子・オスカーは、幼い頃に受けたある呪いを解くために、世界最強と名高い「青き月の魔女」のもとを訪れる。
“魔女の塔”の試練を乗り越えて契約者となったオスカーだが彼が望んだのは……。

altTitles.de: Die Prinzessin prägt ein dem Rebellen

altTitles.es-la: La princesa se obsesiona con el traidor

altTitles.ja: 皇女、反逆者に刻印する

description.en:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands… that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eve’s scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---

description.es:
La séptima princesa imperial, Evenrose, murió una vez.Su último recuerdo fue cuando la familia real fue destruida por el Homúnculo, quien provocó la traición y se ahogó en el plan de su hermano parado de su lado, al tragar veneno. Pero cuando volvió a abrir los ojos,"Yo ... no estoy muerto."Se da cuenta de que ha vuelto al pasado y que era ocho años más joven. Fue antes de que el tercer emperador, que será el próximo heredero, fuera elegido oficialmente como sucesor. Una oportunidad para evitar la caída de la familia imperial presionando al tercer emperador Bridgette y siendo reconocida como sucesora. Como parte de la preparación, Evenrose decidió escribir su propio artículo sobre Michael, el rey de Homunculus y el monstruo de la prisión pública, para ganarse el corazón del emperador."Te necesito, Michael. Muy desesperadamente."¿Podrá Evenrose atraparlo y proteger a la familia imperial de manera segura?

description.fr:
Il était une fois, un royaume où grâce à une alchimie interdite, des homonculus étaient créés.

Ces homonculus devaient se soumettre à la volonté de la famille Impériale à l’aide d’une magie d’asservissement. Les plus doués d’entre eux faisaient partie de la garde du château et parmi eux, la famille Impériale devait en choisir un pour en faire leur chevalier personnel. Mais un homonculus résista au sort de l’Empereur: Mikhaelis Agnito.

Il organisa une rébellion, souleva les homonculus contre l’empire et exécuta toute la famille Impériale à l’exception de la 7ᵉ princesse, Evenrose et la 8ᵉ princesse, Rosenite. Cette dernière, éperdument amoureuse de Mikhaelis, croyait qu’elle portait en elle le «résultat de leur amour.» Elle pensait être exceptionnelle mais elle n’était en vie qu’uniquement parce qu’elle avait subit une expérience avec la pierre philosophale, qui ne fonctionnait seulement qu’avec le sang royal. Une simple marionnette que Mikhaelis pouvait contrôler à sa guise.

Cependant, le traître avait des sentiments pour Evenrose, car elle était différente. Elle était contre l’utilisation des homonculus comme esclaves et étudia durement pour leur rendre leur liberté, faisant d’elle le mouton noir de la famille Impériale. Malheureusement, elle ne comprit pas les actions de Mikhaelis et croyait qu’elle allait se faire exécuter comme les siens.
Rosenite en profita pour venir la voir et l’empoisonner, se réjouissant de la mort de sa demi-sœur, pensant avoir Mikhaelis pour elle seule. En apprenant la nouvelle de la mort d’Evenrose, Mikhaelis tente alors par tous les moyens de la ressusciter. Un mage lui proposa un moyen: celui de retourner dans le temps. Néanmoins, seule Evenrose gardera les souvenirs de tout ce qui c’était passé jusqu’à présent. Mikhaelis accepta sans sourciller, du moment que sa bien aimée était en vie. Quand le sort se lança, Evenrose ouvrit les yeux et se retrouva 8 ans en arrière.

Sera-t-elle capable de changer son destin?

---

description.id:
Putri kekaisaran ketujuh, Evenrose, pernah meninggal. Kenangan terakhirnya adalah tentang keluarga kerajaan yang dihancurkan oleh Homunculus, para budak yang memberontak, dan tentang saudara perempuannya yang telah memihak para pemberontak dan mendesaknya untuk melarikan diri dari eksekusi menyakitkannya dengan menelan racun. Tapi ketika dia membuka matanya lagi, "Aku... aku tidak mati." Dia menyadari bahwa dia telah pergi delapan tahun yang lalu, kembali ke masa sebelum saudara perempuannya yang kejam, Bridgette, dipilih sebagai kaisar berikutnya. Diberi kesempatan untuk mencegah jatuhnya keluarga kekaisaran dengan dipilih sendiri sebagai kaisar berikutnya, dia memutuskan untuk menulis artikelnya sendiri tentang Michael, raja Homunculus dan monster penjara umum, untuk memenangkan hati kaisar. "Aku membutuhkanmu, Michael. Sangat buruk." Akankah Evenrose bisa mendapatkannya dan melindungi keluarga kekaisaran dengan aman?

description.it:
La settima principessa imperiale, Evienrose, una volta morì e l'ultima cosa che ricorda fu quando la famiglia reale venne distrutta dagli Homunculi, e il tradimento della sorellina. Ma quando riaprì gli occhi si rende conto di essere tornata nel passato e di avere otto anni in meno, e ha così l'opportunità di impedire la caduta della famiglia imperiale incalzando il terzo imperatore Bridgette e facendosi riconoscere come successore. Come parte del piano, Evienrose ha deciso di avere dalla sua parte Mikhaelis Agnito, il futuro re degli Homunculus. "Ho bisogno di te, Mikhaelis." Riuscirà Evienrose a riuscirci e a proteggere la famiglia imperiale?

description.ja:
人造人間「ホムンクルス」の反乱によって滅びたハーデルラミド皇室。第7皇女イヴは妹の裏切りによって１度は命を落としたものの、錬金術の力で８年前の世界で再び目を覚ます。 イヴが皇室滅亡の未来を変えるための方法―それは皇室を滅亡に追い込んだホムンクルスの王・ミカエルを自らの専属騎士にすることだった。 皇女と反逆者、前世ではすれ違ってばかりだった２人が向かう未来とは——！

description.ko:
7황녀 이뷔엔로즈는 한 번 죽음을 맞이했다.그녀의 마지막 기억은 반역을 일으킨 호문클루스들에 의해 황실이 망하고그들의 편에 선 동생의 계략에 빠져 독약을 삼키고 죽었던 기억이었다. 그런데“나…… 안 죽었어……?”다시 눈을 떴을 때, 그녀는 자신이 8살이나 어려진 채 과거로 돌아왔다는 사실을 깨닫는다.그것도 다음 대 후계자가 되는 3황녀가 정식으로 후계자로 낙점되기 전으로.‘이건 기회야.’3황녀 브리지테를 누르고 후계자로 인정받아 황실의 몰락을 막을 기회.그 대비의 일환으로 이브는 황제의 마음을 얻고 자신의 가능성을 시험하기 위해호문클루스들의 왕이자 공중감옥의 괴물 ‘미카엘’을 자신의 기사로 들이기로 하는데.“미카엘 그대가 필요해. 아주 절실하게 말이야.”과연 이뷔엔로즈는 그를 얻고, 무사히 황실을 지켜낼 수 있을까.

После падения императорской семьи от рук гомункулов, седьмая принцесса Ивенроуз умирает, выпив яд, предложенный сестрой. 在霍文克鲁斯的带领下，皇室走向了灭亡。第七皇女伊维安洛斯被他们控制在一旁，在妹妹的见证下服毒而死。 再次睁眼时却回到了8年前。为了防止皇室的没落，她决定亲自撰写文章，讲述霍文克鲁斯的首领，亦是公共监狱的怪物-‘米卡尔’的故事。 “我需要你，米卡尔。非常迫切。”

description.de: Der einzigartige Kampfkünstler und stolze Herrscher der Dämonensekte, Mookhyang, landet durch einen Fluch der gegnerischen Blutsekte in einer geheimnisvollen Fantasy-Welt. Doch wenn herauskommt, welch unglaubliche Kontrolle Mookhyang über Qi oder Mana hat, ist es nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis er erneut verflucht wird ... und sich in eine junge Frau verwandelt!? Wird die Macht über chinesische Kampfkunst in dieser Welt der Elfen, Magier und Drachen ausreichen, damit ein Mann (oder eine Frau) wieder nach Hause zurückkehren kann? Oder wird dieser arme Krieger letztendlich eine Niederlage erleiden?
description.en:
The exceptional martial artist and proud hierarch of the Demonic Sect, Mookhyang, winds up in a strange new fantasy realm after falling victim to a curse cast by his enemies, the Blood Sect. But when Mookhyang’s incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, it’s only a matter of time before he gets cursed again… and turned into a young lady?! 

In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat? 

[Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aBOSaO6uOk)

description.fr: Mookhyang, pratiquant des arts martiaux et hiérarche de la Secte Démoniaque, se retrouve plongé dans un univers fantastique après avoir été victime d'une malédiction de la part de son ennemi, la Secte du Sang. Mais lorsque les capacités de contrôle du Qi (ou « mana ») de Mookhyang sont révélées au grand jour, ce dernier se retrouve bientôt à nouveau maudit... et transformé en... jeune fille ! Dans cet univers où vivent elfes, mages, chevaliers et dragons, la maîtrise des art martiaux chinois suffira-t-elle à un homme (ou à une « femme » ? ) pour survivre et retrouver le chemin vers un monde ordinaire ? Ou bien cet humble guerrier déclarera-t-il forfait ?
description.ja: 千年に一人の達人「脱魔」の域に達した魔教の教主、墨香。 しかし武林の支配を目論む張仁傑の怪しげな術により異なる世界へ飛ばされてしまう。 言葉も文化も分からない世界で、墨香の孤独な戦いが幕を開ける。
description.ko:
마교의 교주로서 극강의 무공을 자랑하던 묵향은 적들(혈교)에 의해 생전 처음 보는 생소한 이세계(판타지 세계)로 떨어지게 된다. 그곳에서 엘프, 마법사, 기사, 드래곤 등 새로운 존재들과 만나며... 무림 최고수 묵향이 원래 자신의 세상(무림)으로 돌아가기 위해 긴 모험을 떠나게 된다는 스토리.

한국의 무협소설과 판타지 문학을 사랑하는 수많은 독자들이 기다려왔던 초대형 이벤트― 웹툰계를 뒤흔들 다시없을 프로젝트가 시작된다! 
1999년부터 시작된 전설, 누계부수 300만부... 무협소설과 판타지문학을 접목시킨 기념비적인 장르소설인 [묵향]이 드디어 만화화!! 

한국 무협판타지의 한 획을 그었던 전동조 작가의 메가히트 장르소설 [묵향]을 만화화! 만화의 내용은 원작의 2부격인 [다크레이디] 편에서부터 시작한다.

description.ru:
Будучи мастером школы темных искусств и непобедимым незыблемым истым демоном, Мукхян, к несчастью, попадает в странный фэнтезийный мир из-за магии своих врагов (школа искусств крови). В новом мире эльфов, колдунов, рыцарей и драконов, разворачивается приключение Мукхяна по поиску пути назад в его старый мир, Мурим.

description.th: มุกฮยาง เจ้าสำนักปีศาจได้ถูกส่งตัวข้ามพิภพมายังโลกใหม่ที่ภาษา, วัฒนธรรมและทุกๆ อย่างได้แตกต่างจากยุทธจักรของเขาอย่างสิ้นเชิง ซ้ำร้ายยังต้องคำสาปให้กลายร่างเป็นเด็กผู้หญิงแสนบอบบางที่เขารังเกียจ แล้วเขาจะหาทางกลับคืนร่างและหวนกลับไปยังยุทธจักรของเขาได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 魔教教主墨香在经历脱胎换骨之后，修道成仙。 却在即将称霸武林之际遭人谋算，被移送至了精灵、魔法师、骑士、龙等生物共存的异世界里，墨香为了重回原来的世界，开始了冒险之旅！
description.pt-br: MookHyang, o mestre da Escola das Artes Profanas e o invencível Demônio Exposto, é infelizmente enviado a um mundo de fantasia estranho pela magia de seus inimigos da Escola das Artes de Sangue. Em um novo mundo com elfos, feiticeiros, cavaleiros e dragões, a aventura de MookHyang em busca de um meio para voltar ao seu velho mundo (Murim) tem início.
description.zh-hk:
身懷絕世武功的魔教教主墨香，被來自血教的敵人
送往生平從未見過的陌生異域(奇幻世界)。
在那裡，他遇上了精靈、魔法師、騎士、龍族...等
前所未聞的人事物。
為了回到原本的世界(武林)，
武林第一人墨香踏上旅程，一場大冒險就此展開!

喜愛韓國武俠小說與奇幻文學的讀者
引頸期盼的超大型活動!
震撼Webtoon界的絕倫企劃正式啟動!
1999年開始連載的傳說之作、累積銷量高達300萬冊...
結合武俠與奇幻的劃時代小說「墨香」，終於漫畫化!!

為韓國奇幻武俠立下全新里程碑的大師級作家
JEON DongZo精心打造的超高人氣小說「墨香」，
終於漫畫化啦!!

漫畫內容由原著第二部《Dark Lady》開展。

description.en:
1: Noel  
On the day before Christmas, Amberley disappears into the forest while searching for Noel's gift. He is cursed and cannot leave without aging faster than normal, but he leaves the forest anyway to deliver gifts to the girl he loves.  
  
2: The Teddy Bear Murder Case  
Four murders have taken place at an all girl school. Lying beside each of the victim was a teddy bear with one missing limb. Now It is up to Detective Hebizuka Amaru and his cute assistant Kohijiri-kun to solve the mystery!  
  
3: The Four Sisters Murder Case  
  
4: A Is For Alice  
Alastair, a grown man, is off to follow the Rabbit once again to return to Wonderland.  
  
5: The Bedroom Girl, The Sculpture Room Girl  
A story about a girl in her death bed finding another chance in life in the body of a doll. But is the girl in the bedroom the same as the girl in the sculpture room? Can the doll master make her dreams come true?  
  
6: B&W ～Black&White～  
A story about a boy waiting for his sister.  
  
7: Le Jardin Du thé  
A mysterious story about a poor young man who orders a kind of tea called Huan Ying – “The Illusion”. He asked for a small quantity - just to have a taste - and was granted one cupful…  
  
8-9: Free Fitting For Her  
A priest and his captured vampire must save a naive and selfish young girl from the murderous desires of a Lolicon. But perhaps this girl isn't all that she seems.  
  
10: Rose Dusk, Pale Moon  
11: Hello, My Sister  
12: The Happy Prince  
  
13: Welcome To Wonderland  
Simon, Alastair's old classmate, is now a grown man who bumps into his childhood Wonderland traveler.

Generally… a story about really cute guy trying to hook up with this really egotistic girl… although it's not really like that.  
  
—  
Uploader's note: Published in Gothic Lolita Bible which doesn't focus on manga, so it has no target demographics.

The Skirt Rings at the Landing

description.en:
Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine "follower" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine "leader" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  
  
Bimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.
description.es-la: Haruma Kiki siempre soñó con hacer bailes de salón como el papel de "seguidora" femenina, pero a medida que pasaban los años solo crecía más y más alta, lo que finalmente hizo que renunciara a verse bien con un vestido o cualquier cosa de dama. Ahora, en su segundo año de secundaria, se especializa en el papel de "líder" masculina, hasta que un día, su pareja la abandona de repente. Cuando Toribami Michiru, una pequeña y linda chica de primer año, aparece queriendo unirse al club de baile de salón, Kiki le pide que sea su nueva compañera, pero Michiru revela que ella solo juega el papel de líder, y ella no quiere nada menos que a Kiki como su compañera.

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

description.en:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.

description.en: One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new "dungeon" has appeared.
description.ja: ある日異世界へ召喚された普通の高校生が、着実にモンスターを倒しレベルを上げ、無事魔王を倒し、世界を救うことに成功！　その最強ステータスのまま現実社会に帰還することに――！？
description.es-la: Un día, un estudiante de secundaria normal y corriente es llevado a otro mundo. Sube su nivel en el otro mundo, derrota con éxito al Rey Demonio y salva el mundo. Con su nivel más fuerte, decide volver a su mundo. Sin embargo, en el mundo al que regresa, ha aparecido también una nueva "mazmorra". Una moderna fantasía de mazmorras en la que el antiguo héroe se convierte en un guerrero, ¡que se adentra en las mazmorras creadas en su propio mundo!

description.en:
Asato Kanami who was summoned as a hero to another world Istalia. 

 To stop the war between the demons and humans, it is said that he was summoned by Anna, the saint of the Kingdom of Elshnon.  

After a year of war, Asato finally challenges the Demon King Lione. Just when he thought the battle was over, his summoner Anna attacked him and the Demon King.  

Asato who survived the attack and was protected by the Demon King. What is the future path for the hero betrayed by humans…!?

Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

description.en: Umi used to be a very sickly girl when she was young. One time, she was on the verge of death after contracting a high fever, but then her fever magically disappeared, leaving behind a star-shape mark on her forehead with the color of the ocean. Now a sixteen-year-old girl, Umi dreams of finding love and having a boyfriend like many other girls her age. There’s one guy at school whom she’s really interested in, but things don’t really go the way she wants them to with another guy showing up out of nowhere… Not to mention, that guy isn’t just your average guy…

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!

description.fr:
Seoljin est un vrai loser à l'école : il est méprisé par tous, même par ceux qu'il croyait être ses amis. La seule chose qu'il puisse faire pour échapper à cette dure réalité, c'est de lire des webtoons d'action, de s'imaginer à la place des héros qui se battent courageusement contre leurs adversaires, sans la moindre hésitation. Mais la vie de Seoljin va prendre un tout autre tournant lorsqu'il laissera un petit commentaire sur le webtoon "Player" : un commentaire qui, bientôt, le conduira dans l'univers-même de ce webtoon !

description.zh:
弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

title.en: Maou Reijou no Kyouiku Gakari ~Yuusha Gakuin o Tsuihou Sareta Heimin Kyoushi wa Maou no Musume-Tachi no Katei Kyoushi to Naru~

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢の教育係 ～勇者学院を追放された平民教師は魔王の娘たちの家庭教師となる～

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Heroes' Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for Demons' Daughters
The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Brave Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for the Devil's Daughters

description.en:
Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King’s daughters.
Flay’s new life as an educator, under one roof with five cute but problematic girls with varying personalities, begins!
description.ja: 次代の英雄を育てる学院̶̶通称『勇者学院』。そこで教鞭をとっていたフレイは、同僚に嵌められてクビになってしまう。そんな彼は、謎のメイドから再就職先を斡旋される。その仕事とは、５人の魔王令嬢たちの家庭教師だった！英雄を育てていた教師が、魔王の娘たちを育てていく。

title.en: Kenseijo Adel no Yarinaoshi ~Kako ni Modotta Saikyou Kensei, Hime wo Sukuu Tame ni Seijo to Naru~

altTitles.ja: 剣聖女アデルのやり直し ～過去に戻った最強剣聖、姫を救うために聖女となる～

description.en:
Hailed as the hero for leading his country to victory from a great war, the blind Sword Saint Adel is now in despair. Unfortunately, he failed to protect his benefactor, Princess Euphinea, whom he dedicated his entire life to. 

"I want to meet the princess once again," he muttered, wishing deeply that his prayers would be answered. A mysterious being, having heard his plea, granted his prayers, and he was sent back to the past, to a time when the princess is still alive. 

Unexpectedly, the Sword Saint (♂) has been transformed into a super-duper cute Sword Saintess (♀), and her heroic tale of unrivaled power will once again take place.
description.ja:
大戦で国を勝利に導き、英雄と称えられながらも、剣聖アデルは絶望の中にいた。なぜなら生涯の忠誠を誓ったユーフィニア姫を戦火から守り切ることができず、失ってしまったから……。

「願わくば、もう一度姫様にお会いしたい」

その切なる願いは高次の存在によって叶えられ、姫がまだ生きている過去へと送られるアデル。ところが、その姿はなぜか美少女になっていて――!?

title.en: Class no Inkya Ojousama no Shitsuji ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: クラスの陰キャお嬢様の執事になりました

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Inkya Ojou-sama no Shitsuji ni Narimashita

altTitles.en: I Became the Butler of the Gloomy Young Lady in My Class

description.en:
My family abandoned me in the night leaving me behind, so I became the butler of the gloomy young lady in my class...

---
Support the author by buying the manga in [Booth.pm](https://booth.pm/ja/items/4380401).
description.ja:
家族が夜逃げし行き場をなくした主人公を拾ったのはクラスの陰キャお嬢様！
執事として尽くすうちに少しずつ絆が芽生え、一人ぼっちですさんでいたお嬢様の外見や態度にも変化が…？

altTitles.ja: 雷雷雷

description.en: Fifty years after the war with the aliens...danger emerges...from within a young girl! Ichigaya Sumire, age 18, works at a "space pest" extermination company to pay off the debts her father left behind. But one day, her life is turned upside down when she's abducted by a UFO!
description.ja:
ガール・ミーツ・エイリアン！

エイリアンと戦争から50年――

市ヶ谷スミレ、18歳。父親の残した借金返済のため宇宙害蟲駆除会社に勤務する日々。そんなスミレの日常が、UFOにさらわれたことで一変する…！頭の中で聞こえる何者かの声…襲いかかる宇宙害獣…さらには軍事企業からも狙われて――！？

description.en:
A Spinoff of <Castle 2: Pinnacle> - An action drama featuring Saroka 'Seo Jintae'!

Jintae becomes a killer after being saved by a man when he was at life's lowest point. While searching for his long-lost sister, he discovers that his younger sister is in Hong Kong and deeply involved with the Triad, Hong Kong's largest criminal organization. Thus begins Jintae's journey as he confronts the Triad in the nighttime streets of Hong Kong while searching for his sister.
description.ko:
<캐슬2:만인지상> 사로카 '서진태'의 액션활극!
삶의 끝자락에서 한 남자에게 구원을 받고 킬러가 된 서진태.
어렸을 적 헤어진 동생을 찾기 위해 수소문하던 중 동생이 홍콩에 있다는 것과
홍콩 최대의 범죄조직 삼합회와 깊게 관련되어 있다는 사실을 알게 된다.
그렇게 서진태는 밤의 도시 홍콩에서 삼합회와 맞서며 동생을 찾아 나서는데...

altTitles.en: Miss Komi Is Bad at Communication.

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.ja: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。

altTitles.vi: Komi - Nữ thần sợ giao tiếp

altTitles.pt: Senhora Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.zh-hk: 古見同學有交流障礙症

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

I found myself possessed in a game I used to play occasionally.
And to top it off, I'm the female warrior of a barbarian tribe that only has bad endings.

...Alright, let's escape.

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me dê seu sangue, eu vou servi-lo em gratidão

description.en:
A young man rescues a young vampire girl who has fallen ill; she tries to give her all to repay him for his blood, but she's too clumsy to do so. A vampire rom-com that depicts a warm life among different species where no one is left behind or abandoned!

A long-awaited new series by the author of "Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!"
description.ja:
行き倒れになった吸血鬼の少女を拾った青年。血の恩返しに精一杯のご奉仕をしようとする彼女だが、あまりにポンコツでままならず。

誰も見捨てない、置き去りにしない、異種族間のあたたかな暮らしを描く吸血鬼コメディ！

「息子がかわいくて仕方がない魔族の母親」作者、待望の新連載！
